label: ham
subject:
svn commit: linux-cifs-client r108 - in
	branches/linux-2.6-cifs-git-devel/fs/cifs: .
body: And surely, the miser individually will be an ignoble competitor in a State for any prize of victory, or other object of honourable ambition; he will not spend his money in the contest for glory; so afraid is he of awakening his expensive appetites and inviting them to help and join in the struggle; in true oligarchical fashion he fights with a small part only of his resources, and the result commonly is that he loses the prize and saves his money.
